traits.Magic Resistance: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Sleepless Reveler: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

actions.Multiattack: The satyr makes three ram attacks or three shortbow attacks.
actions.Ram: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Hail of Arrows (Recharges after a Short: The satyr fires an arrow that magically transforms into a flurry of missiles in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14+1d4 + 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
